attributes.action: Prioritise Climate Change Over Other Things And Focus On Slowing It Down
attributes.background: Climate Change is now speeding up and soon enough we won’t even live because before there were 12 years to stop climate change but now there are only 18 months to stop climate change.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do help combat climate change. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268785
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259051
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258464
